task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain) with cell-type labels in adata.obs. Using expression-only data, subset cells labeled MICROGLIAL. Within MICROGLIAL, run a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE), requiring logFC > 0 for OLD and adjusted p ≤ 0.05. Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj). Use gene symbols from adata.var['feature_name'] when available (otherwise from adata.var_names); convert to UPPERCASE, deduplicate, and drop Ensembl-style IDs. Return the top-k OLD-upregulated microglial genes as markers_predicted (k=16).

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (~≥80% GT overlap using top-16).
